title: Frankenstein: Letters 1, 2, and 3
description:
Phoebe reads a chapter a day of Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley’s Frankenstein. Read along.


Our other shows are Criminal and This is Love.


Donate to Phoebe Reads a Mystery.
